title: Waaree Energies secures 90 MW solar module supply order in Rajasthan
description: "Waaree Energies has secured a 90 MW order to supply dual glass bifacial modules to Juniper Green Cosmic Private Limited, for their solar project in Bikaner, Rajasthan," the statement said.
